Prerequisites¶

CLI Mode¶

  • python >= 3.7 on top of a POSIX conform operating system.

Daemon Mode¶

  • python >= 3.7 on top of a POSIX conform operating system.

  • RabbitMQ as message broker (optional)

  • SQLAlchemy compatible database backend (optional, defaults to sqlite)

Currently jinjamator is just tested on top of Ubuntu 20.04
Nevertheless, it should run on top of any distribution satisfying the python release requirements.
